pcomponents

Class Reactor

  • java.lang.Object
    • pcomponents.PlantComponent
      • pcomponents.Reactor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Reactor
extends PlantComponent
    A reactor is an object that controls the nuclear reaction inside the plant. Based on the percentage of lowering of the control rods, the water inside the reactor is heated up. When a particular temperature is reached, some amount of water is converted to steam which goes out of the reactor. Reactor's health gets lower when the max temperature or pressure is exceeded. When a reactor's health is 0 or lower, the game is over.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public int getMinSafeWaterVolume()

      • updateWaterVolume

        public void updateWaterVolume(int amount)
        Updates the amount of water in the reactor. Also stores the amount of water pumped in for future calculations. This method should only be called once per timeStep.
        Parameters:
        amount - amount of water to add to the total in the reactor.

      • getSteamVolume

        public int getSteamVolume()

      • updateSteamVolume

        public void updateSteamVolume(int amount)
        Updates the amount of steam in the reactor. amount can be negative and will be when steam is leaving the reactor.
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount of steam to add to the volume.

      • getHealth

        public int getHealth()

      • getPercentageLowered

        public int getPercentageLowered()

      • setPercentageLowered

        public void setPercentageLowered(int percentageLowered)

      • updateState

        public void updateState()
        Updates the state of the reactor. Updates the temperature, pressure, evaporates some water if appropriate and check if the reactor is damaged based on it's internal temperature and pressure.
        Specified by:
        updateState in class PlantComponent

      • updateTemperature

        private void updateTemperature()
        Updates the temperature inside the reactor. Change the temperature based on the heat produced by nuclear reaction and the cooling based on the water pump in from the condenser.

      • updatePressure

        private void updatePressure()
        Updates the pressure inside the reactor. It depends on the amount of steam that is currently inside the reactor.

      • cooldown

        private int cooldown(int waterTemperature,
           int pumpedIn)
        Calculates the amount of cooldown in the reactor for this time step. Dependent upon the temperature and volume of water being pumped into the reactor.
        Parameters:
        waterTemperature - temperature of the water being pumped into the reactor.
        pumpedIn - amount of water pumped in since the last timeStep.
        Returns:
        how much to reduce the temperature by.

      • heating

        private int heating(int loweredPercentage)
        Calculates the amount of heating in the reactor for this time step. Depends upon how far the control rods are lowered. If there is less than the minimum safe amount of water in the reactor, the control rods will heat up much more quickly. (The maximum heating amount is multiplied by UNSAFE_HEATING_MULTIPLIER)
        Parameters:
        loweredPercentage - percentage the control rods are lowered.
        Returns:
        how much to the increase the temperature by.

      • percentageToDecimal

        private double percentageToDecimal(int percentage)
        Does what it says on the tin. Assumes input is a valid percentage (i.e. not negative)
        Parameters:
        percentage - percentage to convert to a decimal
        Returns:
        percentage as a decimal.

      • evaporateWater

        private void evaporateWater()
        Calculates how much water to boil off and updated the volumes of water and steam as necessary.

      • checkIfDamaging

        private void checkIfDamaging()
        Damages the reactor if temperature and/or pressure is higher than the max temperature and max pressure.

      • damageReactor

        private void damageReactor()
        Damages the reactor by amount of HEALT_CHANGE_WHEN_DAMAGING.

      • checkFailure

        public boolean checkFailure()
        Returns true if health is 0 or lower.
        Overrides:
        checkFailure in class PlantComponent
        Returns:
        true if health is 0 or lower.
